title: Palm Up Hand Dark Skin Tone
description: A hand with the palm facing up, often used to offer, ask, or receive. The dark skin tone modifier is applied.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the palm-up hand emoji with a dark skin tone is rendered with a gentle, inviting gesture. The palm is slightly cupped, with soft, rounded edges and a smooth gradient that suggests a realistic, supple texture. Apple's characteristic realistic lighting creates a subtle sheen, conveying openness, generosity, and a willingness to offer or receive. This emoji is frequently used to express offering help, seeking something, or simply conveying an open and receptive attitude.
